message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
Too high, I'll wait for a better offer!
Meet me in the middle, but I'm still hoping for a better deal!
I'm not giving up, I'll try to squeeze out a bit more!
Not quite there yet, I'm holding out for a better deal!
Getting desperate, but I'll try to squeeze out a bit more!
Getting close to the end, but I'm not giving up yet!
Not enough, I'm not going to settle for such a small share!
Last chance, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect more!
This is my last stand, take it or leave it!
No way, I'm not settling for 10% of the remaining money!
This is my last stand, take it or leave it! I'm not going to give up now!
